title: The 5-Minute Weekly Budget Check-In That Might Change Your Finances
description: Let’s be honest, sticking to a budget is sometimes kind of like trying to keep a toddler clean during spaghetti night. You try, but life is messy. So many people think budgeting is something you set once and leave alone. In actuality, budgeting is more like sourdough starter. You’ve got to check in, stir thingsRead More
author: Crystal Paine
